title: Please give me honest feedback :) no troll
body:
THIS IS NOT A RANT i just really want good feedback because i am not understanding this permaban and riot won't respond. 

thanks in advance! 

i get it you guys can't see all that was said and i think that is a huge issue, i got permaban for this one single chat log and i just don't understand why.

here is the context of the conversation.  i was vs a real life friend me and him talked all game long everything said was in all chat my friends was in a 4 man premade so was my team i was solo que from champ select 1 guy was trolling me, no big deal then all 4 of them started trolling me and flaming me after i got ganked at my blue at lvl 1 i was typing in-between camps to my friend. my team went as far as to make stuff up in all chat saying i was saying things i didn't say it was comical even the entire enemy team was basically flaming my team because of the stuff they were saying but what ever no big deal or so i thought.

this is not a complaint i just want some feedback as to why i may have been permaban? i have contacted riot support and nobody got back with me i never reported any of my team despite the fact the were calling me all sorts of names it was honestly funny. 

so please some good honest feedback

also dose anyone know why there is only MY chat logs and not the entire games chat logs? i mean this would clear up anything that i said completely.

Game 1
Pre-Game
ZELDÅ: plz dont ban elise i might go her
ZELDÅ: not that anyone bans her anyhow but
ZELDÅ: mid u ap ?
ZELDÅ: well me and leona only ap
In-Game
ZELDÅ: ill take root first but will need leash
ZELDÅ: leave there
ZELDÅ: and come here lol
ZELDÅ: ok gg bot lane lol
ZELDÅ: how is everyone tonight ?
ZELDÅ: ah i see
ZELDÅ: hope they have their carry pants on hahaha
ZELDÅ: hey man my jungle is open just sayn
ZELDÅ: no but im not doing much
ZELDÅ: got that team that is well all in a group and nice huge ego
ZELDÅ: not rude but like example my 1 death i pinged so many times and asked for help n they sat there csing while i die next to them
ZELDÅ: that type of team lol
ZELDÅ: not talking to you ..........so mute me
ZELDÅ: 0.O true story
ZELDÅ: so yall inting >?
ZELDÅ: awe haha
ZELDÅ: i watched that from my blue
ZELDÅ: rofl
ZELDÅ: lol
ZELDÅ: so i take it yall a premade also ?
ZELDÅ: nice
ZELDÅ: on the bright side ....talon falls off soon
ZELDÅ: sorry cant im waiting for
ZELDÅ: why tbh ?
ZELDÅ: i was just waiting for frog hahah
ZELDÅ: i need someone to end the game so i can get in a non-premade
ZELDÅ: EGO CHECK !!
ZELDÅ: rofl
ZELDÅ: ok i get it now thewy all on first name basis so they rl dweebs hahaha
ZELDÅ: so yall trolling your friends now hahah
ZELDÅ: dude they bitching at each other hahah
ZELDÅ: they on each others laps haha
ZELDÅ: got not anything else to do haha
ZELDÅ: yes wipe them hahah
ZELDÅ: all you guys need to do is get in one murder ball and end it
ZELDÅ: but know what they may not be good but they are cool ppl
ZELDÅ: owen
ZELDÅ: sounds 13
ZELDÅ: so ok im gettign a good mental picture of this grp
ZELDÅ: ok
ZELDÅ: ??
ZELDÅ: rofl
ZELDÅ: haha
ZELDÅ: yea my team all schoolmates
ZELDÅ: first off im white
ZELDÅ: 2nd i dont have kids
ZELDÅ: hey what ever you want to think man draw your own mental picture
ZELDÅ: mine has 4 fat kids in it sitting in a basement somewhere in michigan
ZELDÅ: ? she unlucky ? no she lucky she dosent have to do a thing haha
ZELDÅ: pew pew
ZELDÅ: nooooooo
ZELDÅ: end it !
ZELDÅ: come on voli wtf man haha
ZELDÅ: HAHHAHAHAHH AATROX NAME IS IAN hahah he must be no older then what 16
ZELDÅ: my IQ just high enough to be a TA for he dod
ZELDÅ: hahahahha
ZELDÅ: imma go cry in my 2016 lambo 1100 hp because you think im a "%%%%%%" haha
ZELDÅ: they doing shit like calling me "%%%%%%" and "shit" thinking im gonna get banned hahah
ZELDÅ: and im not toxic ive said 100% of everything in all caht
ZELDÅ: chat *
ZELDÅ: you most def do live chat very ez
ZELDÅ: YEA WHAT VOLI SAID HAHAH
ZELDÅ: ok morg dick move man haha
ZELDÅ: lol
ZELDÅ: i dont have a wife sorry
ZELDÅ: yea i will not get married period fuk %%%%%%ZELDÅ: i will when it gets back and i will cry my heart out in i%%%%%%you just for you haha
ZELDÅ: no its getting oil change
ZELDÅ: yes 2016 ?
Post-Game
ZELDÅ: what about 2016 has you twisted ?
ZELDÅ: not a cance in hell sorry
ZELDÅ: guy *
ZELDÅ: you never will
ZELDÅ: 2016 ?
ZELDÅ: tuesday i will
ZELDÅ: haha
ZELDÅ: fuck yea im broke bro hahaha
